parameter.name: maxSGAP
parameter.description: Max. secondary azimuth gap for an origin to be reported by. Default is 360 degrees, i.e. no restriction based on this parameter.

parameter.name: thresholdXXL
parameter.description: Arrivals with exceptionally large amplitudes may be flagged as XXL, allowing (in future) faster, preliminary "heads-up" alerts.

parameter.name: maxStationDistance
parameter.description: Stations outside the maximum distance range are ignored.

parameter.name: maxDistanceXXL
parameter.description: XXL picks from stations beyond maxDistanceXXL are ignored.

parameter.name: minStaCountIgnorePKP
parameter.description: If the station count for stations at < 105 degrees distance exceeds this number, no picks at > 105 degrees will be used in location. They will be loosely associated, though.

parameter.name: cleanupInterval
parameter.description: Clean-up interval for removing old/unused objects.

parameter.name: maxAge
parameter.description: Max. age for objects kept in memory.

parameter.name: adoptManualDepth
parameter.description: If set to true, autoloc adopts a depth from a manual origin. If false, autoloc may set a default depth (autoloc.defaultDepth).

parameter.name: amplTypeAbs
parameter.description: If this string is non-empty, an amplitude obtained from an amplitude object is used by ... . If this string is "mb", a period obtained from the amplitude object is also used; if it has some other value, then 1 [units?] is used. If this string is empty, then the amplitude is set to 0.5 * thresholdXXL, and 1 [units?] is used for the period.

parameter.name: amplTypeSNR
parameter.description: If this string is non-empty, it is used to obtain a pick SNR from an amplitude object. If it is empty, the pick SNR is 10.

parameter.name: publicationIntervalTimeSlope
parameter.description: This is the parameter "a" in the equation Δt = aN + b for the time interval between origin updates.

parameter.name: publicationIntervalTimeIntercept
parameter.description: This is the parameter "b" in the above mentioned equation for the update interval Δt.

parameter.name: stationConfig
parameter.description: Location of autoloc stations config file.

parameter.name: pickLog
parameter.description: Location of autoloc stations config file.
